# Havoptic - AI Coding Tool Release Tracker
# https://havoptic.com
# LLM-friendly site description (llms.txt standard)

> Havoptic is a comprehensive release tracking platform for AI coding tools.
> We track version updates, changelogs, and new features from leading AI-powered
> development assistants. Updated daily via automated pipelines.

## Tracked AI Coding Tools

1. **Claude Code** - Anthropic's CLI tool for AI-assisted coding
2. **OpenAI Codex CLI** - OpenAI's command-line coding assistant
3. **Cursor** - AI-first code editor with built-in AI assistance
4. **Gemini CLI** - Google's AI coding assistant for the terminal
5. **Kiro CLI** - Amazon's spec-driven AI coding agent
6. **GitHub Copilot CLI** - GitHub's AI pair programmer CLI
7. **Aider** - AI pair programming in your terminal
8. **Windsurf** - Codeium's AI-powered IDE (formerly Codeium)

## Data Endpoints

- **Release Data (JSON)**: https://havoptic.com/data/releases.json
  - Contains all tracked releases with version, date, summary, and full notes
  - Updated daily when new releases are detected

- **Feature Matrix (JSON)**: https://havoptic.com/data/feature-matrix.json
  - Comparison data across all tracked tools
  - Includes pricing, platforms, language support, and capabilities

- **RSS Feed**: https://havoptic.com/feed.xml
  - RSS 2.0 format for feed readers

- **JSON Feed**: https://havoptic.com/feed.json
  - JSON Feed 1.1 format for programmatic access

## Key Pages

- **Home (Timeline)**: https://havoptic.com/
  - Chronological timeline of all releases, filterable by tool

- **Tool Comparison**: https://havoptic.com/compare
  - Side-by-side comparison of all tools with feature matrix

- **Trends & Insights**: https://havoptic.com/trends
  - Release frequency analysis and version history charts

- **Blog**: https://havoptic.com/blog
  - Analysis and insights about AI coding tools

### Individual Tool Pages

- Claude Code: https://havoptic.com/tools/claude-code
- OpenAI Codex CLI: https://havoptic.com/tools/openai-codex
- Cursor: https://havoptic.com/tools/cursor
- Gemini CLI: https://havoptic.com/tools/gemini-cli
- Kiro CLI: https://havoptic.com/tools/kiro
- GitHub Copilot CLI: https://havoptic.com/tools/github-copilot
- Aider: https://havoptic.com/tools/aider
- Windsurf: https://havoptic.com/tools/windsurf

## Example Queries

LLMs can use Havoptic to answer questions like:
- "What are the latest features in Claude Code?"
- "Compare release velocity between Cursor and Claude Code"
- "When was the last Gemini CLI update?"
- "Which AI coding tool has the most features?"
- "Show me the release history for Aider"

## API Usage Notes

- All data is publicly accessible without authentication
- Please respect rate limits and cache responses where possible
- Data is typically updated once per day via GitHub Actions
- For programmatic access, prefer the JSON endpoints over scraping HTML

## Structured Data

The site includes JSON-LD structured data on all pages for enhanced search
engine understanding. Release pages include SoftwareApplication schema.

## Contact

For questions or data requests, visit the GitHub repository or contact
through the website.
